com.vungle.sdk

Interface VunglePub.EventListener

  • Enclosing class:
    VunglePub

    public static interface VunglePub.EventListener
    An interface that is used to detect advertisement events. Note: when a callback is executed, it is called in a brand new Thread, so if the callback makes changes to your UI thread, then you will need to use some sort of method to properly interface with the UI thread. (Using an Android Handler object, or Activity.runOnUiThread(Runnable) are two common approaches.)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onVungleAdEnd()
      This procedure is called when a user is done watching a vungle ad.
      void onVungleAdStart()
      This procedure is called right before showing a vungle ad.
      void onVungleView(double watched, double length)
      This procedure will be called after the user views an ad.

    • Method Detail

      • onVungleView

        void onVungleView(double watched,
                double length)
        This procedure will be called after the user views an ad.
        Parameters:
        watched - The viewed portion of the video ad. (In seconds.)
        length - The length of the video ad. (In seconds.)

      • onVungleAdStart

        void onVungleAdStart()
        This procedure is called right before showing a vungle ad.

      • onVungleAdEnd

        void onVungleAdEnd()
        This procedure is called when a user is done watching a vungle ad. This is different than onVungleView because onVungleView will not be called in cases where there is a Pre-Roll HTML asset in the advertisement, and the user opts out of the ad before even seeing the video.
